name: Sathyavani Infotech
overview: sathyavaniinfotech.com offering online medical transcription training with job. We have 12+ years of excellent track record for providing training with job in medical transcription. We trained more than 4500 students. We will send CDs plus book material through courier. Our online support team 24x7 will be available to help through skype, gtalk, and yahoo to clear doubts and give feedback on American doctor dictation practice. We are also offering data entry, web designing, and Internet Marketing services.
